name: BROTHERS FOREVER
description:
this game is a game sent in a gam jam called The LostRelicGames Game jam and the goal is to finish a game in a week...

WHY DOWNLOAD?

This game is inspired by simplistic games like "CATS ARE LIQUID" and "THOMAS WAS ALONE" so if you enjoyed the experience of playing those, then you can get the same one here! or if you haven't played those then, a SIMPLE but BEAUTIFUL experience is here for you..
